column5: Should be a good one if the skies remain clear...  http://www.cbc.ca/m/news/topstories/leonid-meteor-shower-peaks-tonight-1.2837658  G.
The snowstorm and 20cm of snow forecasted suggest that there won't be much to see around here.
I'll trade you a snow shower for a meteorite shower, you don't have to shovel them.  Maybe snow showers would take a hint and burnout on entry.
Should be a good one if the skies remain clear...    G.  What part of Ontario are you in Gerritt ??
it has started here in Lindsay all day long if you squint your eyes.  Looking normally it's still just snow...
I THINK I SEE THEM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!............................dammit!  False alarm.
